import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Link, useRouteMatch } from "react-router-dom" import { listCards} from '../utils/api/index' function SingleDeckCard({ deck, deleteHandle } ) { const {id, name, description} = deck const {url} = useRouteMatch() return (

  • {name}

    {deck.cards.length} cards

    {description}

    • ) } export default SingleDeckCard
